title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, 2 purples, and black applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue and yellow applied by brush (chintz).
description: Diamond lattice of columns and curving ribbons enclosing floral sprays. Indian adaption of a European design for printed fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, 2 purples, and black applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue and yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-15.
